title: ENCODE Experimental Dataset
description: Schema for submitting an primary set of files to ENCODE (Experiment)
comment: Experiment is a special case of Dataset

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

accession.comments: Not to be submitted or updated by non-admin users.
accession.title: Dataset Accession

description.description: A plain text description of the experimental dataset
description.title: Experiment Description

target.description: Protein, RNA, or chemical target of the experiment
target.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Target label or UUID
target.title: Target ID

assay_type.description: Ontology term describing assay used for this replicate
assay_type.comment: Use OBI ontology (term_id) or New Term Requst no. from DCC
assay_type.title: Assay type

term_id.description: OBI Ontology term ID describing assay type
term_id.title: Assay (OBI) Ontology ID

geo_dbxrefs.description: List of GEO dbxrefs (GSR or GSM#s)
geo_dbxrefs.title: GEO DBXREFs

lab_aliases.description: List of lab IDs or cross-references
lab_aliases.title: Lab Aliases

encode2_dbxrefs.description: List cross-references to the previous ENCODE2 system
encode2_dbxrefs.title: ENCODE2 DBXREFs

documents.description: List of other experimental protocol documents
documents.comment: For automatic submission supply unique Document names or uuids
documents.title: List of Documents

files.description: List of files in this dataset
files.comment: For automatic submission supply unique data File accessions or uuids
files.title: List of Data Files

reference.description: Pubmed id for a published reference
reference.title: Pubmed Reference

possible_controls.description: List of control experiments that could apply to this experiment
possible_controls.comment: For automatic submission supply Experiment (dataset) accessions or uuids
possible_controls.title: List of Possible Control experiments
